timeline.meta_desc: SC Kim's Experience in IT Timeline
timeline.title_job_description_00: Mobile Development Team. Involved in SunwayPals Loyalty Programme (Android & iOS)
timeline.title_job_description_01: Explore, help communities in Android Custom Development, such as ROM, frameworks and OS libraries
timeline.title_job_description_02: An interviewed role that acts as liaison between Universities and Google. Learnt skills of event organizing and technical along the period.
timeline.title_job_description_03: Event Organizer, Asset Designer. And Technical Speakers for Firebase and PWA.
timeline.title_job_description_04: Travelling around, hired for development projects, self-enhancement hacking journey.
timeline.title_job_description_05: Cofounder for Digital Solutions and provide optimal efficiency according client's needs. Have a Nice collaboration is our ideal concept to get things done.

interests.title: Interest
interests.paragraph_1: Apart from being a mobile & web developer,I enjoy most of my time being indoors because 365 days of summer. Travel almost every continent in world, and Mingle around developer communities, as part of my enjoyment and self-improvement. I like to support web fast and widely supported, esp. performance, best practices and accessibility.
interests.paragraph_2: When indoors (like very much), I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and decent anime shows,<strike> I am the one who cooks</strike> I like to learn cooking,while I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
